AI-driven materials design for a sustainable world

The chemical industry must innovate with more sustainable materials and chemical processes. We have developed a generative AI platform that helps discover new catalysts that optimize for the right chemical reactions, all while factoring in physicochemical and manufacturing constraints.

We welcome collaborations, partnerships, and new teammates. If you are interested in working together, please get in touch. We are just getting started!
